snippet.title: Arcade Game: Zero Hour (1980 Universal)
snippet.description:
A shooting 'em up game where you maneuver your spaceship and destroy meteorites and enemy ships falling from the top of the screen. Shooting a red meteorite awards a quadruple score. After all enemy ships have been destroyed, a landing pad will appear where you must carefully land your ship. Bonus points are awarded for a successful landing.

Note: Re-uploaded due to improved sound emulation. Used invisibility cheat after down to last life.
